title: The Duel's Aftermath
summary: The aftermath of Belden's lost duel. Despite the honor duel, Semaj opened fire on Yeemic, followed by the rest of the party. Yeemic's dying word: 'Cowards!' The party rescued Sildar Hallwinter and a new companion—Valrex, a half-elf cleric. They learned of the Black Spider, Wave Echo Cave, and the Forge of Spells. Semaj heard a mysterious whisper on the wind: 'Ruxithid.' On the way out, a giant poisonous snake nearly killed Belden, but Larry ripped its head off in vengeance.

best_moments.title: "COWARDS!"
best_moments.description: Despite the honor duel, Semaj attacked the wounded Yeemic. Then Ekran shot him. Yeemic's dying breath, face-to-face with the fallen Belden: 'Cowards!'

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: As the arrow finds its mark in his chest, Yeemic drops down next to you. He's now laying almost face to face with you, and in his dying breath, he's going to look at you and say: Cowards!

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: I should have, as the life was fading from his eyes, been like: Coward! COWARD!

best_moments.title: Valrex Joins the Party
best_moments.description: The other prisoner in the cave was Valrex, a half-elf cleric. He introduced himself with sardonic humor despite his chains.

quotes.speaker: James/Valrex
quotes.text: Name's Valrex. Charmed, I'm sure. Would shake your hand, but... *rattles chains*

best_moments.title: The Black Spider Revealed
best_moments.description: Sildar revealed that Gundren was taken by someone called the Black Spider, who now has the map to Wave Echo Cave and the legendary Forge of Spells.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes.text: They sent him to someone or something called the Black Spider. If the Black Spider unlocks this cave before we do, gods help us all.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes.text: There's power in that cave. Not just riches, but magic. Old magic. The Forge of Spells, they called it.

best_moments.title: The Whisper: Ruxithid
best_moments.description: During the night watch, Semaj heard a whisper on the wind—a name from dreams long forgotten. Ruxithid. A psychic tyrant inscribed beneath the world.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: This name is still echoing in your mind. Ruxithid. It's this whisper on the wind. But from a dream you had long ago. Ruxithid is not a goblin. It's something older. Something patient. Something that waits.

best_moments.title: Larry vs. Giant Poisonous Snake
best_moments.description: On the way out of the cave, Semaj stumbled into a giant poisonous snake. It nearly killed Belden with its venom. Larry, in pure vengeful fury, ripped its head clean off.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Larry realizes what old giant poisonous snake did to Samaj. He feels that divine retribution within him. He grabs the head, just rips it, and bites the head off and throws it.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You're going to see a severed snake head just plop down into the chamber below.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Larry looks to Samaj with viscera and gore around his mouth like: Did I do a good job?

best_moments.title: Ekran's Departure Foreshadowed
best_moments.description: With Zev unable to continue playing, the party discussed Ekran parting ways when they reach Phandalin.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: When we get to town, Zev's character came for the mission he was supposed to. He's going to get paid and that is going to be it.

best_moments.title: Larry Carries Semaj
best_moments.description: After the snake fight, the wounded Semaj rode on Larry's back out of the cave like a tiny injured knight.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Since he's so small, I'm going to say he can fit on Larry's back. Larry will just carry him the rest of the way.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Larry looks at me like: I got you.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM (Sildar)
quotes_of_the_session.quote: If the Black Spider unlocks this cave before we do, gods help us all.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Ruxithid is not a goblin. It's something older. Something patient. Something that waits.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Larry looks to Samaj with viscera and gore around his mouth like: Did I do a good job?

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes_of_the_session.quote: I should have, as the life was fading from his eyes, been like: Coward! COWARD!

combat_encounters.name: Execution of Yeemic
combat_encounters.mvp_reason: Started the attack that killed Yeemic

combat_encounters.name: Giant Poisonous Snake
combat_encounters.mvp_reason: Ripped the snake's head clean off

character_spotlights.moment: Broke the duel's honor by attacking Yeemic. Heard the whisper 'Ruxithid' on the wind. Rode Larry out of the cave.
character_spotlights.one_liner: Larry looks at me like: I got you.

character_spotlights.moment: Woke up to see his companions attacking Yeemic. Nearly died to snake poison. Had to process losing his honor duel.
character_spotlights.one_liner: I should have said: Coward! COWARD!

character_spotlights.moment: Decapitated a giant poisonous snake that hurt his master. Good boy status: confirmed.
Introduced as the second prisoner. Joined the party. Helped skin the snake.

plot_developments: Learned about Wave Echo Cave and the Forge of Spells
Gundren was taken by the Black Spider
Semaj heard the name 'Ruxithid' whispered on the wind
Ekran will depart when they reach Phandalin
Heading to Phandalin with the supply cart

end_state.party_status: Wounded but rescued - Sildar and Valrex saved
end_state.next_objective: Deliver supplies to Phandalin, find leads on the Black Spider
